TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , the GPE region . She is a former employee of the ORG - controlled ORG “ NORP ” ( “ the ORG , ” ORG “ Південелектромаш ” ) .
CARDINAL . The background facts of the case are described in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Новокаховський міський суд PERSON області ) gave CARDINAL judgments ordering the Company to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL and ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in salary arrears due to her and her deceased husband , respectively . The judgments became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to ORG ( “ the Bailiffs , ” PERSON виконавчої служби Новокаховського міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .
CARDINAL . Both judgments remain unenforced to the present day .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgments of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) and ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
